code: import React,{useEffect,useRef,useState,useContext}from"react";import Slider from"react-slick";import"./style.css";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{UserContext}from"../../../pages/UserPage";import{baseURL_,baseIMG_}from"../../../utils/env";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CatSlider=props=>{const[allData,setAllData]=useState(props.data);const[totalLength,setTotalLength]=useState([]);const context=useContext(UserContext);const[itemBg,setItemBg]=useState(["#fffceb","#ecffec","#feefea","#fff3eb","#fff3ff","#f2fce4","#feefea","#fffceb","#feefea","#ecffec","#feefea","#fff3eb","#fff3ff","#f2fce4","#feefea","#fffceb","#feefea","#ecffec"]);useEffect(()=>{setAllData(props.data);},[props.data]);const slider=useRef();var settings={dots:false,infinite:false,speed:500,slidesToShow:10,slidesToScroll:1,fade:false,arrows:context.windowWidth>992?true:false,autoplay:context.windowWidth>992?2000:false,centerMode:context.windowWidth>992?true:false};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"catSliderSection",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid",ref:slider,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"hd",children:"Danh m\u1EE5c s\u1EA3n ph\u1EA9m"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{...settings,className:"cat_slider_Main",id:"cat_slider_Main",children:allData.length!==0&&allData.map((item,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/user/cat/".concat(item._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info",style:{background:itemBg[index]},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:baseIMG_+item.image,width:"100",height:"100"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"text-capitalize mt-3",children:item.name.toLowerCase()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[item.parentShose.length," s\u1EA3n ph\u1EA9m"]})]})})},index);})})]})})});};export default CatSlider;
